UPDATE cb_task
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
client_id = #{clientId},
instance_id = #{instanceId},
node_id = #{nodeId},
task_id = #{taskId},
parent_task_id = #{parentTaskId},
name = #{name},
display_name = #{displayName},
perform_type = #{performType},
task_type = #{taskType},
operator = #{operator},
finish_time = #{finishTime},
org_id = #{orgId},
WHERE id = #{id}
